clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: This website does not store the visitor's user-agent or IP address and does not use fingerprinting, advertisements, or tracking of any form.

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: No identifying information is logged, such as the visitor's cookie, user-agent, or IP address.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Here are a couple lines to serve as an example:

2019-01-19 16:37:47 +00:00 200 GET /api/v1/comments/xrlETJYzH-c?format=html&hl=en-US 1345.88ms 2019-01-19 16:37:53 +00:00 200 GET /vi/r5P-f5arPXE/maxres.jpg 1085.41ms 2019-01-19 16:37:54 +00:00 200 GET /watch 7.04ms

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: This data will not be intentionally shared with anyone or anything.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text:
Using this feature will store a cookie in the visitor's browser containing their preferences.
This cookie is sent on every request and does not contain any identifying information

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: This website provides links to googlevideo.com to provide audio and video playback

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
